title: Forecast Range Unit
description: Describes how to interpret the points array in a DeliveryForecast â€” what axis the curve represents

enumDescriptions.spend: Points at ascending budget levels. Standard budget curve showing how delivery metrics scale with spend. Default when field is omitted.
enumDescriptions.reach_freq: Points at ascending reach/frequency targets. Used in broadcast planning where the publisher shows how cost scales with frequency goals.
enumDescriptions.weekly: Metrics are per-week values. Budget refers to total campaign spend. Frequency of 3.2 means 3.2 exposures per week.
enumDescriptions.daily: Metrics are per-day values. Budget refers to total campaign spend.
enumDescriptions.clicks: Points at ascending click targets. Used in performance campaigns where the buyer specifies click goals.
enumDescriptions.conversions: Points at ascending conversion targets. Used in goal-based planning (e.g., Meta-style 'tell me your goal, I'll tell you the budget').
